The new version has been updated：

+ Adapt, iPhone Xs, iPhone Xs Max
+ Adapt the iPad split screen mode
+ Add merge replication
+ Add Face ID and Touch ID privacy locks

Fix bugs

-----------
Last version updated：
+ Adapt, iPhone Xs, iPhone Xs Max
+ Adapt the iPad split screen mode
+ Add merge replication
+ Add Face ID and Touch ID privacy locks
+ Optimization of several details

What's new in this update:

# Add merge copy, merge edit function
Allows copying and editing of terms in the specified order, flexibly handling more usage scenarios.

# ADD URL Schemes Quick Start
Achieved by other applications through the fastcopy:// command

# Optimize UI design
New design, more concise

# bug fix
Fix some bugs found, thank you for your positive feedback

- Fix several issues

Thank you for your support. If you have any questions, please contact us at alex@kollway.com and we will support you in time!

This update:
- Optimize iCloud syn

Long time no see, the 4.0 version brought a surprise change.

- Added rich text editing function, graphic and text editing.
- Add common language merge edits before sending.
- Generate long images.
- Pictures can be quickly shared through the system sharing function.
- Allow partial copying of content
- Optimize performance and fix several bugs.
Bringing you better FastCopy, fixing iOS13 several issues
Fix crashes that may be caused by iOS13
Fixed several found bugs, running more smoothly

- Fix the carriage return problem during continuous paste
- Other details adjustment
